events.message: We have received the application of John Doe for the Software Engineer position. His resume highlights strong experience in backend development and APIs.
The candidate's application has been categorized under Engineering given his extensive background in software development and programming languages.
Recruiter Sarah has been assigned to manage the hiring process for the software engineering role and will proceed with screening the candidate shortly.
The initial screening call with John Doe went well. He demonstrated a strong understanding of software design principles and problem-solving skills.
John responded promptly to the interview invitation and confirmed his availability for the technical interview scheduled next week.
The technical interview has been scheduled for June 10th at 2 PM UTC with the senior engineering team to assess coding skills and architectural knowledge.
